landmark-unique:
To ensure landmarks have a unique role or role/label/title, you should assign appropriate ARIA roles and labels to the different sections of your web page. This helps assistive technologies like screen readers to identify and navigate the landmarks properly. Here's an example of how to do this using HTML and ARIA: ```html Unique Landmark Example

Company Name

  • Home
  • About
  • Services
  • Contact

Article Title

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Related Articles

  • Article 1
  • Article 2
  • Article 3

© 2022 Company Name. All rights reserved.

``` In this example, we have the following unique landmarks: 1. `
` - Represents the header or banner area of the page. 2. `
` - Represents the main navigation menu with a unique label "Main navigation". 3. `
` - Represents the main content area of the page. 4. `
` - Represents an individual article within the main content area. 5. `
` - Represents a related articles section with a unique label "Related articles". 6. `
`
